content.detailedDescription: Leaving my house for my evening walh at about 8:35 i happened to look south west across the valley at the view and noticed a white spherical looking light. it was quite an unusual or out of place object that i trained my eyes on it. the light appeared to hover or move extremely slowly toward rhe east at an altitude i estimated as approximately 3,000 feet. after 30 or 40 seconds it began to perceptably increase its velocity toward the east, still very slow but oviously moving. at this point it blinked out completely once, then reapeared, then blinked again, and again, appearing smaller each time until it completely disappeared.
content.summary: Object looked  like a ball of white light  hovering at first, then moving slowly toward the east after about 60 seconds it began to blink a few times then grew smaller and blinked out

content.detailedDescription:
I currently live in toledo, ohio, but in may of 2012 i was visiting my hometown of kyiv, ukraine. the camera i took overseas with me, a nikon d3100, was purchased recently, and i did not know how well the camera would capture images at night. so before bed on may 17, 2012, i pointed the camera at the buildings across the street from where we stayed (street: priluzhna house #:10) and clicked the shutter. i took a few photos over a span of ten minutes. when i looked across the street, over the apartment buildings, i saw and heard absolutely nothing. everything was so quiet that i did not see what i captured until the next morning, upon closer examination of my pictures. when i consulted my friends and family members, we tried to think of a rational explanation. the object could not be a cable dish, because it moved. it could not be a plane, because of its shape. it could not be anything human made, because i could not see it or hear it with the naked eye. in fact, as you can see in some of my photos, there were people outside, next to the building over which the object hovered. the people obviously did not see or hear it either, because they did not look up or act out of the ordinary.

so the next day, may 18, i decided to take more photos. this time, i captured only an eerie light, which seemed to move away from the building, but nothing so obviously disk like. again, i could not see anything with the naked eye or hear anything.

over the next few days, i took more photos, but captured nothing on film, until the night of may 21, 2012. this time, from 11:10 pm until 11:17 pm. i captured a disk that seemed to hover and move up and down over the building across the street. like before, i could not hear anything, and could not see the object without the help of my camera. i took some continuous shots of the object, and some shots where i waited a minute or two before i took consecutive shots. the object first hovered over the building for a few minutes, then moved up and to the left, toward the building behind it (as appears in the photos i uploaded). then the object returns, and again seems to hover over the building, then did the same as it did before, move flew to the left to the next building and disappeared. 

my first reaction to the object was disbelief, because i could see it with my own eyes. then, as the photographic evidence became more conclusive, i became frightened, and after the night of may 21, 2012, i did not take any more photos. from may 17 to may 21, 2012, i have 37 photos of the object, which i captured with my nikon d3100. each photo is date and time stamped (i did not change the time on my camera, which was still in the eastern time zone, ukraine is seven hours ahead), and was not altered in any way. upon my return to the united states in june 2012, i chose to share my story with you.
content.summary: The actual ufo was never actually seen or heard by me, however, it was captured by my camera, a nikon d3100, in fine quality

content.detailedDescription: Returning from my nightly walk in the hills behind my house i looked up just as i was preparing to let myself and my dog into the garage as something bright in the sky caught my eye. i stood and watched as a brightly glowing (several times brighter than a full venus) brilliant ball of pure white light passed above and a little south of me on a gently curving east north east trajectory. i watched for a few minutes as it traveled completely silently above me and into the distance. it was moving relatively slowly as it remained in my view for about 7 minutes i knocked on the patio door and my wife and son came out and watched it with me. my son commented on the slightly zig zag or wavering motion of the object as it grew gradually dimmer in the eastern sky. i saw a similar object about 10 days before this while leaving on my evening walk. i will do a seperate post for that sighting as the behavior of that object was different from this one.
content.summary: Brightly glowing orb traveling silently west to east at altitude of approximately 2 miles along a gently curving path some minor zigzag as it moved farther away

content.detailedDescription: I was coming home from work on the expressway. cars were backing up on the expressway due to a ballgame in town. as i was slowing down a clear ball with a white light inside came from the nw directly at the front of my car and almost bounced off and went directly right to the east. i  came home and told my husband my story and he said i looked scared. i said that i was because it was the strangest thing i've ever seen. hense my search to see if anyone else has every seen such a thing or am i going crazy? freaky, freaky, freaky!!!
content.summary: A clear cirle with a white light inside

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i went out to our front porch to smoke before bed around 10pm. since i had another sighting recently i can't stop looking at the night sky. since the last sighting on the 28th of may, i have seen 4 steady lights traveling across the sky but nothing to interesting. but, this sighting was just as odd as the 28th. the 1st object was a steady dim light traveling from the west to the east. when facing north the object was about 70deg from the horizon. it came into view and traveled in a straight line until no longer visible. it crossed about half of the viewable sky in about 2 min. this object was very high poss. outside of our atmosphere. as soon as i lost sight of it i check my phone for the time. it was 10:14 
a few minuets later i saw a 2nd steady dim light traveling south approx. 45deg from eastern horizon. it was also very high alt. it was visible for about 1min before i lost sight of it behind some trees.
i observed a 3rd and 4th at 10:28. around 50-60deg from the northern horizon i saw a stationary bright flashing light and another light flying past the flashing light. the flashing was brighter than any star, and seemed timed. there was prob 1 sec between several flashes. the first flash in the series was brighter than subsequent flashes. the passing object would start as bright (not as bright as the flashing one) and dim along its path until it would disappear then would reappear further along its path bright again. it did this 5 or 6 times covering most of my viewing area. its path also seem to have a slight curve to it. the 3rd or 4th time it reappeared it looked like it was either double or maybe dropped something. meanwhile, the flashing one flashed several times after the other had passed it faded out then reappeared a second or two later on the path of the one that had passed it and did another series of flashes before disappearing again.
i also saw several planes during this time. the last object that i saw appeared near a plane. the plane was prob around 30k ft heading east. the object may not have been close to the plane, poss. much higher. it was due east 40deg above the horizon and moved nnw for about 2 min before i lost track of it at 10:59.
i could see the marker lights on all the planes even the ones i believe to have been around 30k ft with the naked eye. i tried to use a pair of cheap binoculars but could not see any faa required lights on the ufos.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 5 more strange lights over leavenworth kansas

content.detailedDescription: I really think they were drones 3 flew in side by side formation northeasterly one went east one turned west lost site of the third this was in the castleton area . there is a small airport close but these were not full size aircraft plus wed and thur blackhawks flying around . firetruck sirens about 5 minutes after we lost sight but not unusual for them in this area
content.summary: Looked like possible military drones

content.detailedDescription: I was laying in my bed at 11 pm on wednesday, june 6th 2012. i heard a strange un-explainable noise outside that did not sound like an airplane, but was in the sky. i heard it for about 2 minutes, then i got curious and walked to the back porch to see. off in the distance to the left of me, i saw a ufo fly away. i lost sight of it, because it went behind some tall trees. it was saucer shaped, with lights all around. it was spinning. it was hard to see, but i'm very sure that it wasn't a helicopter or airplane. the lights were white/yellow, and they blinked in sequence. i couldn't believe my eyes, and i was shaking. i started to cry, and for about an hour after that i was in a strange shocked-like state of mind.
content.summary: Heard strange noise,checked outside, saw ufo off in distance

content.detailedDescription: At sunset, my daughter and i noticed these three extremely bright stars, that couldnt be stars, for they were too low to the earths surface, so i went in and grabbed my nikon d5000 camera and took one video clip, then several photos, where one of the objects raced forward toward us, then was sort of dull grey, transluscent and it looked like there were things inside of it, but we couldnt really tell what.  there was no noise and it was just floating or hoovering at the edge of my apt. building and it was approx 12 to 15 feet, i supposed in diameter.  then it appeared to be moving slightly towards us, so we got scared and ran into the apartment.  ever since then, we have had some extremely strange happenings inside of  our home, with shadows and light, even feeling something that we couldnt see, entering our bodies that would cause our heads to be extremely heavy and sometimes pain in various spots and every time we leave someplace, one of the bright stars, that are still outside of our apartment complex, follows us, and will come down quite low.  i keep feeling like there is something implanted on the inside of my back now, that sort of moves around.  on a friday night at the end of march, my daughter and a friend of mine had seen what appeared to be a floating lantern sort of hoovering in tree that's on the neighboring property and it also looked almost as if there was some sort of creature inside of it, but was not making any noise as it hoovered.  we didn't really have the time to investigate, so we just ignored it and continued on with what we were doing and that was at around 10:45 pm, along the fence line of my carport.  i have hesitated to say anything, but this has become an ongoing nightmare and there doesn't really appear to be anyone from the government that you can report these types of things to.  my daughter will not leave my side!  i hope this helps someone that might be having the same thing happen to them.I will email photos, as requested, they are on my iphone.
content.summary: Three star like extremely bright orbs spotted too low to be stars, then when photos taken, one raced forward, silently and mutated into 12 ft round floating circular grey shape

content.detailedDescription: I was on a flight returning to california from florida. i noticed the skies over texas were very very dense with pollution and smoke. after taking a short snooze i realized i was over new mexico flying over mountains that were ablaze and smoke moving eastward. i was looking out the window and i observed two jets flying eastward to their destinations and as i looked back at them i notice a very large, dark object that looked as if it was tracking us since it never wavered or changed in size. it was over the mountains on fire but it made them look like little mounds of dirt, this object being so huge. the jet i traveled in was at an altitude of 39,740 ft and going away from the object. after the second plane went by going eastward i noticed the large object descend somewhat, make a directional turn as if it was going after the jet but not, and headed eastward/southeastward and disappeared from my sight. this event lasted perhaps 5 minutes but am not really sure of the time. it could have been more . . . this is not the first time i had seen this large object in the sky and almost at the same place but it was over texas and that was in 2010 on a return flight too going east to west.
content.summary: Large object over the new mexico skies observing fire

content.detailedDescription:
my boyfriend was over the other night. we were watching t.V. and had decided to go out on my porch to smoke a cigarette. we sat on the step, i lit my cigarette, and looked upwards. i saw what looked to be either a very bright white star or a planet. the center was very bright and there was also a kind of halo of light surrounding it in the shape of a circle. after watching for maybe one second i realized that it was moving towards my left (north). my boyfriend had his eyes on the light as well. he didn't have his glasses on so he couldn't see it as well as i could but he could tell that it was moving. i thought it may have been a plane as i continued to watch it since i live relatively close to the richmond airport as well as the hanover county airport, but tried and failed to find the usual flashing red and blue lights or at least hear the engine.
    suddenly, the object stopped moving and the circular halo of light around the object seemed to become squished into more of an oval. my jaw was dropped wide open and my eyes were probably as big as they could have gotten. it quickly decreased in sized and seemed to be moving up and diagonally away from where i sat at maybe a 130 degree angle to make a rough estimation. it went from a substantial and easily visible orb of light to the size of a pinhole in an unreasonably rapid rate and disappeared into the sky.
    like i said, my boyfriend did not have his glasses on at the moment but he could tell that the light that he'd just seen had quickly disappeared. from my awestruck reaction he could tell that i was somewhat uneasy and amazed.
content.summary: Ball of light breaks northbound path and disappears upwards into the dark sky

content.detailedDescription: Well around 2:30 me and my brother was out side looking up and talking to him and saw two lights move from nw from where were at and this first headed east and they got close to one another and kept going east and i have on tape then wee seen two after we just seen at a lats min at around 3:15 in the morning, and after that we started to hear a high pitch noise and after we went out we see one going west to east and got that on tape and a plane that followed it but then i shut it off on the last one going nw to east.
content.summary: Five lights seen going west heading east by 2 / video recorded of event of three of them.

content.detailedDescription:
I wasn't going to report this, but that's twice now in the past few weeks that i have seen something odd in the sky of saskatoon. the first time i had went for one of my late night drives, which involves an ice cap and loud music not ufo hunting at all. when i decided to go home, after getting out of my vehicle i felt this scary feeling so i hurried to my back door to find it locked, that's when i decided to look up and there right above my yard and a very tall spruce tree was this bright white star like object hovering with a weird path(it could be a satellite) but this was really big and bright and looked like it was in our atmosphere. so i watched it for a few seconds then i unlocked my door and went in to get my room mate. he came out but we had to run to the front because we could not see it past the trees. the front of the house was worst but we could see it moving through the trees still at the same pace so i decided to run out back again and get in my car, and i drove fast down the alley way to the street near by which has a big clearing of most of the night sky but nothing! it was gone so i drove to 8th then to the university bridge and still nothing. 

story number 2 just happened tonight, i had taken one of my late night drives  and ended up going into the wood lawn cemetery. usually i park in the fields just past the cemetery to collect my thoughts and as i was sitting there looking at my face book this scary feeling came over me again, so i looked up and around and i noticed this bright star or so i thought in the sky above the industrial section of saskatoon. so i am thinking ok this is clearly just a star its changing colours like other stars i have seen but then i thought but that's in the winter time so i looked at it again and it was gone. so i left the graveyard i still had that scary feeling the whole time, and after going for a short ride around the west side i ended up parked in rotary park by the river. just as quickly as i parked i got that same creepy feeling again so i looked out my window and there was another of those bright white star like objects and this time it seemed super close, i didn't know what to do so i watched it as it seemed to hover towards me and i got this feeling like it was checking me out. then i turned towards it with my car and it jolted and started to hover towards broadway/8th street, during this time i tried to videotape it but was to shaky, though it's on there but still hard to make out. so after it started to get dimmer i decided to follow it only to lose it again. never found it again. 

i am starting to think that perhaps i am being followed or something. or i am just parked in places at the wrong time? i don't know what but something strange is going on in the saskatoon night sky's this year!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Slow star like objects hovering above saskatoon.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside smoking a cigarette when i seen what looked like a bright white orb floating across the sky with no sound seconds later a smaller object came speeding up behind it and i thought that it was actually going to collide with it but it passed by it at extreme speeds and then disappered. while the first object kept at a steady slow speed across the sky until flying out of range of site.
content.summary: Two bright lights one larger than the other that appeared white with blue aura

content.detailedDescription: time was 1:20am when i happened to notice from my backyard at approx. 35��� to my horizon, a dim orange orb looking northeast of my position. it was faint at first but grew brighter and appeared to be going faster headed northwest. the stranger part was quite a bit back behind it i saw a flashing strobe like light appear out of nowhere and looked like what seemed to me like it was chasing it. it gradually started catching up to it as they both sped up! both the steady glowing orb and the flashing light traveled from northeast in a counterclockwise circular pattern all the way around across the sky's horizon in a 3 quarter circle radius. after about 5-6 minutes of watching these lights travel across the sky in circular pattern the flashing light that was behind the other got up very very close to orange orb light and suddenly stopped flashing and was gone. the other orb light kept traveling but i lost it as soon as it got real close to the moon due to full moons brightness. i have never seen anything like that and won't forget it either..
content.summary: Steady orange orb makes circular pattern all across night sky chased by flashing strobe of light

content.detailedDescription: We were outside looking at the thunderstorm over the denver metropolitan area, looking west and north west and i saw a long shaped object with exremely fast flashing lights. at first i thought perhaps it was a plane, but immediately realized that it was moving incredibly fast and the lights were fluttering or flashing at a extreme rate. as i looked up about the treeline, the object moved west northwest i would say 100x faster than an airplane, which caught my attention so i told my partner to look very quickly, she saw it as well and i lost sight of it, and she continued to see it as it immediately and sharply turned due west. i then caught it again in my sight as it again turned sharply and immediately southwest. my partner stated she saw an airplane below the ufo traveling at a much slower rate at in the sky just below the object.
content.summary: Long, pulsating lights, moving extremely fast

content.detailedDescription: My brother worked as a civilian security patrol guard at the former narf(naval ammunitions reserve facility) us navy base in vieques, p.R. about 15-20 years ago. although for some reason(maybe the language barrier) little has been informed to the public about it, this area has had a fairly large history of ufo and alien activity. this activity was concentrated and has been recorded to had happened here more during the years that the us navy operated and had they're base facilities here. it is said that many people who were there at some time during those years observed and witnessed several unexplained ufo and alien beings encounters. this eye witness reports were people that included civilian security personel, local police officers, us navy personell stationed at the base there, and civilians from the island. it is known that some of this unusual encounters and incidents were recorded and entered into official records by the us navy people. and also that this records became us government "classified information". vieques is a very small carribean island and part of puerto rico a few miles south-east of the main island. the us military occupied 3/4 of the whole island for over 50 years until around the year 2004 when they ended operations there. they had two military bases there, this particular one on this story was the us navy on the west side of the island. and it was a location were navy stored naval ammunitions for the atlantic fleet. you can see vieques and both od this the military bases there that were feautured in clint easwood's movie heartbreak ridge (1986). my brother was working as a civilian patrol security guard there when he had this encounter. he recalls that on this occasion, him and a security guard partner were patrolling doing they're rounds around this very remote area on the hills on the base facilities area. and while they were at at one of the ammunitions storage magazine warehouse, they spotted in the distance a very unusual craft(ufo)hovering in the air over this remote beach area. my brother in total disbelieve became very inquisitive about what he was observing. and talked to his partner about wanting to drive down to that area to take a closer look to see what this thing was. but his partner seemed to be full of fear about it, and did not wanted to drive down there to get any closer to the object. my brother observed that this thing hovering in the air over that beach was emitting all this very unusual colored-lights and that is was something like he had never seen before. and he could not explain to himself what that thing was. but whatever it was, it did not appear to be like something out of this earth. he did not wanted to go alone down there closer to that beach area to investigate what that thing was. finally he was able to convinced his very frightful partner to join him and drive they're 4-wheel drive patrol vehicle down there and take a closer look at it. according to his description of the account, they drove down from this hill area down this remote beach 4-weels trail and stopped the vehicle a little distance away from where the craft was still hovering over the beach. and he got out of the vehicle mesmerized observing all this wierd display of colored lights comming out of this hovering craft. he went back into the vehicle and brought out this spot light with him. and then he began to flash like signals to this craft. at this, it sounds like the craft noticed they're precence nearby. and inmediatly turned and began hovering and approching them at a very fast speed until it came to a distance right above they're heads. and even with both being so frightened by this, they observed all this lights comming out of it and then like a light beam began comming out from the bottom of the craft at them. inmediatly panicking and back inside the vehicle they managed to peel away and make a run down that trail away from that thing for dear life. and they kept going until they got back to the base buildings area. and this story is one of the several others ufo/allien encounters that had occured over the years on this area in vieques, p.R.
content.summary: My brother had a close encounter with a ufo craft that was observed close to the ground on this very remote beach area on a this small carribean island.

content.detailedDescription: I went out to dry my clothes since my apartments has the laundry center outside. i noticed a bright blue object flying freely in the air. instantly caught my attention and i was stuck starring at it, i had never seen anything move soo fasy and smoothly in the sky. it had about 4-6 blue lights in a straight pattern. i could not make the entire shape if it because it was dark out but i did notice they were in a single form. it began to go in different directions, from up and down, side to side and even in different angles. only blue lights no other. i ran inside to call my husband and when he came out, the object had moved further north until it disappeared. location 35ave and peoria
content.summary: It was spinning in all directions. not like a plane or helicopter, was more movig freely

content.detailedDescription: I was standing near the corner of 1st street and washington street in san diego california between 9:30pm and 10:30pm on june 6, 2012.  at 9:48 pm i saw a single light traveling south to north almost directly overhead; but slightly west of me.  this area is very close to the san diego airport, so planes, jets, helicopters and military aircraft are very common.  in fact, there were aircraft in the area during both sightings.  the first light did not have any blinking collision lights. the light was slightly higher than the jets coming in for landing at the san diego airport; but still pretty low.  there was no noise.  the light had passed over me and then was about where the 8 freeway would be below it, and then, the light just turned off.  there was no overcast this evening.  this was interesting, but if that was all i saw, i wouldn't have filled out this form.  then at 10:18pm, a single semi-transparent light flew by faster than any jet has ever flown by.  i could see it less than 4 seconds.  this light was dull white and it almost seemed like i could possibly see through; but i could not.  it flew in a straight line and very low, almost at the same elevation as the jets coming in for the final landing pattern at the san diego airport southwest of this location. this dull white light was traveling southwest to northeast with no noise.  it flew low, in a straight line and was totally silent.  (if there has been coastal fog or overcast, it would have been below that level.)  this light did not turn off like the first light but i lost sight of it only because it was blocked by buildings. every jet or plane that passes by at the same elevation as the second light, or even much higher, can easily be heard. this second light was totally silent.  this was not a meteor, i have seen many meteors.
content.summary: One slow white light and then one semi-transparent white light traveling low and very fast

content.detailedDescription: This am i had gotten my walk with my dog in and she barked at the door shortly after aggressively i went out and she was still on leash she immediately looked up at the sky i too looked and we saw a round bright white yellow light no flashing lights with it. the light headed south east over our heads it stopped for a second or so and then continued i watched as clouds came in just shortly behind it making the same pattern as the light. also noticing that the moon was never covered by the clouds during any of this time when we went for our walk it was clear starlight sky. i was able to guess the hight by it passing the tree in my back yard. florence oregon.June 6,2012  4 :44 am normally not light out at this time this was an exceptionally bright am
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Huge white yellowish light flying south eastern clouds following its path

content.detailedDescription: Me and two other friends were on our way to a movie in maine coming from massachusetts when my friend in the driver's seat noticed the object in the sky. his cousin in the back seat and i drew our attention to the object and watched it until it disappeared. it was in triangle form and had white lights on the outer edges and one blinking red light in the middle bottom part of the craft. we all assumed it was a ufo since we couldn't figure out what kind of craft it could be and my friend is a pilot so he would have known. we were pretty close to the movies and watching the time closely so we have an accurate time that we witnessed this. we just thought it was cool and decided to look on the internet to see if anyone else saw it and ended up finding this website.
content.summary: Me and two other friends were on the way to a movie and saw a triangle craft hover in the distance and disapear suddenly

content.detailedDescription:
About 9:30 pm on june 6 i saw 2 objects in the sky.  i guess they were about a mile away, although a frame of reference is difficult to guage.  they were blue and red lighted objects.  that is, i saw both blue and red linear/tubular type lights possibly framing the objects.  it's not that the objects flashed an obvious red to blue, or converse, maybe the object rotated so i could see different colors?  i was on the west side of olathe lake in kansas looking east.  my best guess is the objects were over oregon trail junior high school.  the 2 objects appeared to hover and then drop close to the ground and then go up and down somewhat in a circular manner.  the motion was very random and independent from the other.  i really didn't pay that much attention to the event because i don't believe in extra terrestrials or the like. i was fishing at the time.  i spoke to another man who stated he had seen the same lights, at least twice before in recent days.  he wasn't overly concerned either.  

here is what i think it is:  lighted kites?   maybe r.C. helicopters? as i mentioned before, i don't believe in aliens, or at least the laws of physics and space travel limit my belief in e.T. chillin' over lake olathe!  therefore, these 2 objects must be explainable.  i know i saw 2 lighted, colored objects moving up, down, and around in the sky.  the moved in a way that no aircraft could possibly move.  i do believe the motions, pathe, and timing could have been precision kites.  i have seen kites at festivals that could have moved this way. i don't know what they were, but i sure would like to!  hence the reason i am reporting this incident.  i have never seen something like this before.  i am not a blogger, or poster for that matter.  i welcome your explanations to what i saw.   please, if you are a crazed lunatic,  don't try to contact me with your insane theories!!!! :)
content.summary: It looked like kites with red and blue lights about a mile away.

content.detailedDescription: I had just laid down in bed to go to sleep. i have a window next to my bed and when i looked out i saw something bright in the sky. it was a bright orange orb just hovering in the sky at least a mile away. it was bigger than a star, maybe comparable in size to a small pea held at arms length. soon after i noticed it, it moved to the left a bit, not incredibly fast but very smooth and gracefully. then the orb got much brighter and faded out. i didn't see it again after that. the whole sighting probably lasted no longer than 30 seconds.
content.summary: Bright orange orb

content.detailedDescription:
Me asome por la ventada al ver un avion pasar y me di cuenta de unos puntos blancos que pasaban arriba de el a una distancia considerable. pense que era una estrella hasta que vi que se movia.. y que seguian pasando muchas mas detras de ella

esferas tenian direccion de noroeste hacia el sureste. la mayoria siguiendo el mismo camino o "ruta". mas de 20. revisando a detalle mi video, me di cuenta que viajaban en ambas direcciones. al final de la flotilla viajaba un ovni en forma de gusano con colores blanco y rosa.

como eran tantas esferas y pasaban las horas, me canse de verlas hasta que vi el objeto mas grande

yo lo vi desde las 10am y no se desde que horas estarian pasando.

m���xico, d.F.
content.summary: Flotilla de esferas que se dirigen hacia el sureste desde el noroeste

content.detailedDescription:
1) setting: front patio of house, 9:55pm wednesday june 6th, 2012
2) n/a
3) n/a
4) listed below
5) farfetched/skeptical, excited/intrigued
6) lost sight as it disappeared over horizon

first unidentified object:

1) large bright lighted "orb." appeared spherical, light did not waver nor did it blink (as if a plane, helicopter would)
2) within atmosphere, at least 1 mile from surface, relative to passenger plane altitudes
3) origin west, direction east- strict path, did not stray from route
4) pace was significantly faster than a plane/helicopter yet, was in view for approximately 2-3 minutes

second unidentified object:

1) same characteristics as first ufo but smaller in size, originated from north west heading east. 
2) seen approximately 5 minutes after first ufo witness.
content.summary: 2 bright white, unwavering orbs heading east at moderately fast pace. w/in atmosphere

content.detailedDescription:
1) setting: front patio of house, 9:55pm wednesday june 6th, 2012
2) n/a
3) n/a
4) listed below
5) farfetched/skeptical, excited/intrigued
6) lost sight as it disappeared over horizon

first unidentified object:

1) large bright lighted "orb." appeared spherical, light did not waver nor did it blink (as if a plane, helicopter would)
2) within atmosphere, at least 1 mile from surface, relative to passenger plane altitudes
3) origin west, direction east- strict path, did not stray from route
4) pace was significantly faster than a plane/helicopter yet, was in view for approximately 2-3 minutes

second unidentified object:

1) same characteristics as first ufo but smaller in size, originated from north west heading east. 
2) seen approximately 5 minutes after first ufo witness.
